img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f3/Wukong_Bitter_49.jpg)
Beware of another tentacle abomination monk waiting for you as you drop down, and then head through the tunnel passage as it begins to narrow.
img_below_text:
Once you reach a fork in the tunnel, take the left exit to head outside, where you'll find a **Treasure Chest** on the right by a large mural, and several Frozen Corpses on a wooden platform to the left.
![Wukong Bitter 52.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/68/Wukong_Bitter_52.jpg)

Beware of another tentacle abomination monk waiting for you as you drop down, and then head through the tunnel passage as it begins to narrow."

![Wukong Bitter 52.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/68/Wukong_Bitter_52.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a dimly lit cavern with a narrow passage leading deeper into the environment. A wooden fence surrounds a statue or carved figure illuminated by warm light, suggesting a point of interest or significance. The player character is seen approaching the area, holding a staff, indicating progression through the tunnel described in the preceding text. The image sets the tone for exploration and hints at potential encounters or discoveries, such as the fork in the tunnel and treasures mentioned in the following text.
